titleInfo.title: Louella Parsons Show - Mark Stevens interview -- Children's radio performances (excerpts)

mods.abstract: Excerpt from a Louella Parsons radio program, featuring an interview with actor Mark Stevens. Followed by excerpts of a radio program featuring musical performances by children. Circa late 1940s, possibly recorded in Lubbock, TX. See also [ TR001804_2 ] and [ TR001805 ].

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
